Reviews.Title: Delighted with my change from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Have had a Samsung S 4 for the last year, it continually seized, and finally stopped completely. I bought the LG g2 having read the reviews. I am really happy with its performance. It is undoubtedly the best phone I have had to date. The battery life is unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT (works in Venezuela)
Reviews.Author: Michelle C
Reviews.Content: I bouth this phone from Wireless Everything. The seller sent the right version of the phone (International, no carrier logos). The box was sealed and the phone arrived in excellent conditions.This is a great phone! super fast, the battery life is amazing, I could not ask for a better phone!5 stars for the phone and the seller ( Wireless Everything. )JUST AN ADVICE (OS)I updated the phone to Kit Kat 4.4 and the message app stopped working (because of the new OS, nothing to do with the phone itselfs ) and there's no way to fix it than going back to Jelly Bean. So, be careful if you're going to updatePD: I use this phone in Venezuela, YES IT WORKS with all carriers. Sirve en Venezuela para todas las operadoras. Venezolanos, cualquier duda pueden comentar.

Reviews.Title: Check when you receive
Reviews.Author: Bill Passarelli
Reviews.Content: This wasn't a deal breaker, and I got it to work regardless, but this is NOT the D802. It is clearly stamped on the back D801, T Mobile Version. Mine works on Straight Talk with ATT Sim. Pay attention to this. Also, do some research on the camera. In daylight, works fantastic. At night, or low light conditions, crappy, blurry, slow to focus. Overall, though, a great phone.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Perfect, i love it, excellent product, highly recommended!.BTW, today i get 4.4.2 OTA , from Venezuela. it works great.

Reviews.Title: Lg G2 D801 32gb Black Unlocked
Reviews.Author: hernan
Reviews.Content: I bought a lg cell g2 D-802, and you sent me a lg g2 D-801, which is not compatible with 3G and Lte bands my service provider and mobile internet telephony, which uses 3G band of 900mhz and 4G lte uses 1800mhz band 3, which are not supported by the phone I received. this really seems like a scam or a fraud, is something very serious publishing an article and deliver another one.but this inconvenience, I must say that is an excellent smart phone, ahead of others of the same category in performance and design, I tried the samsung galaxy s4, xperia sony z1 and the htc one, and I'm quite sure that the G2 quality is superior in almost every aspect, from the camera, the screen, the processor, the performance of the android environment is unsurpassed on this device. I am absolutely delighted with this phone is highly recommend them.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: LeninRodriguez
Reviews.Content: Every thing is perfect, i recomernd it, very nice phone, better than S4, battery life is very good, fast, all of this is ok. What their offer is what i get

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Samantha Taylor
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! I recently bought this phone unlocked so that I could put a Straight Talk SIM card in it. I love Straight Talk and it's great that we can finally bring our own phones to Straight Talk. I got it out, and like most people, I didn't read the instructions on putting in the SIM card. I saw this almost unrecognizable slot in the side of the phone, but I couldn't push to open it so I then proceeded to try to pry the back off the phone, which didn't work. haha So I went on Youtube to see how to put the SIM card in. I had to get the little "G" lock from the bottom of the box, stick it in the little hole next to the slot and then it will pop open. This is phone is very different from anything I have seen before, but in an awesome way! I also had a little bit of trouble with the mobile data not working, but I was able to google the problem and come up with the correct APN that would work with my phone. I would definitely recommend this phone! The buttons in the back take a little getting use to, but once you do, it is so much better than phones with the buttons on the side and front. I also how to google how to take a screenshot. haha I'm learning how to use it and that is part of the fun. :)Oh, and the battery life is fantastic! I charged it and used it for a day and a half... and by that time it was just on 47%! I was on facebook, the internet, and snapchat all throughout the day. I have no doubt that if it would have lasted me 2 full days without charging, but I like to keep it around 30% or more. I recently switched from a Samsung Galaxy and the LG G2 has such a better battery life. It's light weight whereas my old phone was heavier and I had to charged it two or three times a day. The pictures on the LG G2 are also A LOT better. It takes clear pictures, has a flash, and a great zoom. It gets a little grainy when zoomed too far, but that's to be expected. I would absolutely recommend this phone. :)

Reviews.Title: Farewell Samsung Galaxy S's & Note's .. Welcome to LG world
Reviews.Author: iLoveTech
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone .. much better than Samsung Galaxy S5 with half the price.LG G2 is thinner and lighter than the S5 with same specs or even better on evey front.Perfect speed, amazing 5.2 inch screen much better than Galaxy S3, 4 or 5 or Note 3.Due to its back buttons you can perfectly operate it with one hand only, also because of its compact size you comfortably hold it in your hand.Only limitation that I encountered is that sun visibility is not do great.

Reviews.Title: Best device on the market.
Reviews.Author: Michael Brown
Reviews.Content: All around strong device especially for the price you can find it at. I have never been happier. Stunning screen,  remarkable battery life. No lag, and an exceptional camera as well.

Reviews.Title: Good phone - but highly priced
Reviews.Author: pritisha
Reviews.Content: The phone is very smart but gets hot after long use. I had issues before as i was given a locked phone instead of an unlocked one. I could have got a cheaper locked phone. I think the pricing was on a higher side.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Khalid salim shamis alhashmi
Reviews.Content: Phone is good and fast processor, but I am having a problem now, I do Formt the device, and now I can not use the phone asks activation Can one help me in this please.

Reviews.Title: The best phone I have ever had!!!
Reviews.Author: brian parra
Reviews.Content: The phone is great the screen has no scratches and the phone feels and looks beautiful there was a noticeable scratch on the back but a case will hide that perfectly the camera is amazing and the videos are HD and look amazing I give this phone 5 stars it is by far the best phone I have ever had!!

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Lodi
Reviews.Content: Great phone overall for a great price. Fast, easy stylish. Camera quality is awesome. Used to have an iphone and find the LG just as easy with many more possibilities.

Reviews.Title: perfect phone
Reviews.Author: zalmen
Reviews.Content: this phone is one the best i ever owned. so much that recommended it to all of my friend and family. i love the quality of the phone. the speed, the camera and the cool unique options that this phone offers!

Reviews.Title: best cell phone I have so far.
Reviews.Author: max
Reviews.Content: very smooth and meet all I expect. I love it in short. One thing I need to point out is you need to find a right dealer to buy because there are several ones. Lower price doesn't always mean lower quality or worse sometimes.

Reviews.Title: cell phone sold me has a fault with the data network not recognize someone please help me fix this or seller acknowledges and do
Reviews.Author: Jesus Requena
Reviews.Content: Good afternoon dear seller , this time I address you as express a problem with a cell phone you sold me on March 5, 2014 , was : LG G2 32 Gb , which is well out physically , this new , but putting on my movistar sim card , I can call and receive calls , texts and also connect via wifi but the phone did not register with the data network and I have a data plan and I've already checked by the operator and all this well then the problem is with the phone . now date of May 5, 2014 I received the phone by delays sending currier you hire (Liberty express) I live in Venezuela and in addition to the political problems that are going on, here there are problems to send cell phone back to USA . do not know how we could solve the problem in terms of a refund or send a new phone or could check the veracity of what I am saying which is totally true to recognize and solve my problem. very kindly farewell grateful and waiting for a prompt response.

Reviews.Title: Battery sensor did not work, phone was unchargeable
Reviews.Author: Siim A.
Reviews.Content: Battery sensor did not work, phone was unchargeable. It was also extremely hard to switch it on actually, it just did not respondee to power on button quite frequently.In all other aspects, it was fine but because of those two aspects, it was unusable for me. Not recommending. This buttons on back approach is bad decision by LG.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: tobin99
Reviews.Content: The best and easiest LG phone i have own except no memory card slot the camera is very good the pictures are flawless it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: LG G2 D802 32gb Black Unlocked
Reviews.Author: Lenford G.Lowers
Reviews.Content: This phone is great,all my friends like it, u guys sold me a good product,i like very much,i don't have to recommend it to any one it already does

Reviews.Title: Just perfect...
Reviews.Author: osmar
Reviews.Content: Amazing screen, a lot of memory, really fast procesor and excellent camera... what can i say??? the best phone i seen ever...

Reviews.Title: exelent
Reviews.Author: Luis M.
Reviews.Content: Great service ,in time, all perfect, the best cell ever ,all in the box. This is the best choise .

Reviews.Title: Very good phone but LG can improve our experience
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: It's fast, good battery, great screen, good camera, very good IR remote control.We appreciate the fact that the LG G2 has FM Radio but we really miss the ability of the 3rd button of the headset to change stations and turn off the radio. It's not justified the fact to take it out of my pockets every time I want to change stations. Hopefully this will be improved in updates.I really like the three Front Touch Buttons on the screen 5.2 inches. However, this buttons greatly reduce the real screen size to 4.8 inches most of the apps. I suggest a new option to hide/show this buttons in order to maximize the screen usage. Hopefully this will be improved in updates.

Reviews.Title: This phone is amazing
Reviews.Author: Noam Tsairi
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Battery lasts forever.- Super fast.- Great button location.- Very high quality IPS screen, the best i've seen.- Great camera with optic stabilization.- Double tap to open.Cons:- Battery isn't removable (there is actually no need to replace it though).- Can't expend with SD card.Overall LG put a lot of effort in this phone. Having had a galaxy S phone, this one is the best in it's current price point.

Reviews.Title: Beware! Model # lg-ls980 doesnt accept external memory cards!
Reviews.Author: Ben "Ben"
Reviews.Content: Major deal breaker.  This phone has amazing features and is ready for the future, except for this one unacceptable downgrade

Reviews.Title: Not bad.
Reviews.Author: Jeanel
Reviews.Content: The phone is kind of ok but I don't like the battery. It doesn't last long. The phone review said that the battery was great but I am not sure for this one.

Reviews.Title: i'm not satify at all with this product i wish  i had bought another kind.
Reviews.Author: monica boafo
Reviews.Content: l have a problem already with the phone the screen just turn black and i'm not able to use at this point and it's unfortunate that l don't have a warrenty on it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone, amazing battery life, poor build quality
Reviews.Author: Joaquin Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing. I was afraid that lg's software would ruin this phone, but j actually found lg's added features to be useful, such as the knock on feature. The only complaint I have with this phone is the plastic back which looks decent but feels horrible, fortunately, this can be solved with the poetic pallete case for lg g2. It's the one I'm using right now and it feels amazing. Other than that this phone is perfect.PS: battey life is unbelievable, it lasts for about 3 days if you are not a power user, if you are, you can expect 2 days or so
